Title: Authorizes the establishment of the home equity protection insurance program
Summary: Authorizes the establishment of the home equity protection insurance program directing the agency to issue a commitment to insure and insure the full value of certain residences which are owner-occupied by persons who meet certain income qualifications.
LawCode: Amd ยง2404, add ยง2405-g, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a home equity protection insurance program
